snippet.title: Tekken 3 (1998) Intro (PlayStation)
snippet.description:
Arguably the most popular of all Tekken games. Tekken 3 boldly replaced the previous main protagonist, Kazuya Mishima, with his son, Jin Kazama. This was a brave decision that was ultimately a massive success for the franchise.

Tekken 3 added sidestepping as a universal mechanic, which truly changed Tekken's gameplay in the biggest way possible. Fans also look fondly on the character roster and music, which captured the grungey 90's aesthetic brilliantly. Tekken 3 will forever be one of the greatest and most iconic fighting games of all time.
